title: BMX
creator_credit: Chaparral Productions Inc and Lew Adams
brief_description: Follows the progress of a BMX race. An exciting film in which cyclists dodge mudholes, leap humps, shave corners and glide in slow motion. Useful for language arts, film making, art, social studies as a discussion starter or to spark a creative writing experience.
